data.name: DataverseRequest_GetDatasetDetails
data.value: Retrieving Dataverse dataset details

data.name: DataverseRequest_GetEmbeddedToken
data.value: Generating Dataverse embedded token

data.name: DataverseRequest_UnexpectedResponse
data.value: Unexpected response

data.name: Exception_ADTranslationNotSupportedOnNonWindows
data.value: The AD-translation is not supported on non-Windows platforms.

data.name: Exception_AcquireTokenFailure
data.value: Unable to obtain authentication token using the credentials provided.

data.name: Exception_AdalIsNoLongerSupported
data.value: Usage of the ADAL AAD library against the V! authentication endpoind is no longer supported.

data.name: Exception_AssemblyMissingInEmbeddedResources
data.value: The '{0}' is missing in the embedded resources.

data.name: Exception_CantObtainUserInfoOnTokenRefresh
data.value: Can't obtain the account information for '{0}' while trying to refresh the token.

data.name: Exception_DataverseRequestFailed
data.value: Dataverse Request Failed.{3}{3}Action: {0}{3}{3}Description: {1}{2}

data.name: Exception_EnumValueMissingInAdalAssembly
data.value: The '{0}.{1}' enum value is missing from the embedded ADAL assembly '{2}'.

data.name: Exception_InteractiveLoginRequired
data.value: Unable to obtain authentication token using the credentials provided. If your Active Directory tenant administrator has configured Multi-Factor Authentication or if your account is a Microsoft Account, please remove the user name and password from the connection string, and then retry. You should then be prompted to enter your credentials.

data.name: Exception_InvalidAuthorityFormat
data.value: '{0}' is an invalid value for a Claims-Token authority.

data.name: Exception_InvalidCertificateThumbprint
data.value: Certificate with thumbprint '{0}' could not be found.

data.name: Exception_InvalidEndpointType
data.value: Endpoint of type {0} is not supported!

data.name: Exception_InvalidIdentityProvider
data.value: '{0}' is an invalid value for an Identity-Provider indicator.

data.name: Exception_InvalidPBIPCapacity
data.value: Internal error: the Power BI premium workspace's capacity uri is null or empty!

data.name: Exception_InvalidServiceAppId
data.value: The provided service application-id '{0}' is invalid.

data.name: Exception_MFARequiredAndSupported
data.value: Unable to obtain authentication token using the credentials provided. Your Active Directory tenant administrator requires Multi-Factor Authentication.

data.name: Exception_MethodMissingInAdalAssembly
data.value: The '{0}.{1}({2})' method is missing from the embedded ADAL assembly '{3}'.

data.name: Exception_MissingDeviceCodeCallback
data.value: A device-code authentication flow is needed and a notification callback was not provided!

data.name: Exception_PbiRequestFailed
data.value: PowerBI Request Failed.{3}{3}Action: {0}{3}{3}Description: {1}{2}

data.name: Exception_PropertyMissingInAdalAssembly
data.value: The '{0}.{1}' property is missing from the embedded ADAL assembly '{2}'.

data.name: Exception_RedirectionFailWithThrottling
data.value: Power BI service is currently busy and the request was throttled, please try again later.

data.name: Exception_RedirectionInfoNotFound
data.value: Unable to locate required information to perform this connection. This could be because your client application does not currently have the required components. Install the latest version of your client application or contact technical support for assistance.

data.name: Exception_RedirectionTokenAsPasswordIsNotSupported
data.value: Unable to access redirected AS Azure server when the external access-token is not a valid AAD token to a Power BI resource.

data.name: Exception_S2STokenMissing
data.value: S2SToken should be specified when applying auxiliary permission on the connection.

data.name: Exception_SpnAuthenticationWithoutPassword
data.value: Acquiring tokens for service-principal requires a password\certificate thumbprint.

data.name: Exception_SpnAuthenticationWithoutTenant
data.value: We cannot connect to the dataset due to incomplete account information. For service principals, make sure you specify the tenant-id together with the app-id using the format app:<app-id>@<tenant-id>; then try again.

data.name: Exception_TypeMissingInAdalAssembly
data.value: The '{0}' type is missing from the embedded ADAL assembly '{1}'.

data.name: Exception_UnknownAuthenticationInfo
data.value: Authentication failed; we cannot locate Azure Active Directory in your environment. This could be because your client application does not currently have the required components. Install the latest version of your client application or contact technical support for assistance.

data.name: Exception_UserAuthenticationWithServicePrincipalProfile
data.value: Service principal profile is only supported in service-principal authentication flows.

data.value: Getting the PBI shared database name
